name: 2D Shooter Final (jack1682)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project

Modifications: 

  • Changed main menu title
  • Changed main menu background color
  • Changed color of font and bolder title 
  • Changed main menu camera background 
  • Changed in game music on all levels
  • Added game over music to all levels 
  • Added victory music to next level buttons
  • Added more enemies to levels 2,3, and 4
  • Added level 3 
  • Added bonus round (level 4) BOSS FIGHT
  • Changed reticle 
  • Changed player fire effect audio clip
  • Changed the life counter to 2 instead of 3 (wanted it to be harder)
  • Changed health and size of straight shooter for boss fight 
  • Changed player fire effect audio 
  • Added bada** Star Wars music to main menu (I know it doesn't count as a significant modifications, but it's pretty cool.)
  • Changed boss score value to 50 instead of 5
  • Added some custom audio (like in game fight music, and next level button music)

Credits: 

Created by Tre Jackson
